SELECT COUNT(*) FROM APPROVAL_DOC A
JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (A.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE ) JOIN DOC_TYPE T ON (A.DOC_TYPE = T.DOC_TYPE) JOIN APPROVAL P ON (A.DOC_NO = P.DOC_NO) WHERE (D.DEPT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR T.DOC_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR A.DOC_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%') AND (A.DOC_WRITER = #{userNo} OR P.SECOND_APPROVER_NO = #{userNo} OR P.LAST_APPROVER_NO = #{userNo})
JOIN APPROVAL P ON (A.DOC_NO = P.DOC_NO) JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (A.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE ) WHERE D.DEPT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' AND (A.DOC_WRITER = #{userNo} OR P.SECOND_APPROVER_NO = #{userNo} OR P.LAST_APPROVER_NO = #{userNo})
JOIN APPROVAL P ON (A.DOC_NO = P.DOC_NO) JOIN DOC_TYPE T ON (A.DOC_TYPE = T.DOC_TYPE) WHERE T.DOC_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' AND (A.DOC_WRITER = #{userNo} OR P.SECOND_APPROVER_NO = #{userNo} OR P.LAST_APPROVER_NO = #{userNo})
JOIN APPROVAL P ON (A.DOC_NO = P.DOC_NO) WHERE A.DOC_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' AND (A.DOC_WRITER = #{userNo} OR P.SECOND_APPROVER_NO = #{userNo} OR P.LAST_APPROVER_NO = #{userNo})
JOIN APPROVAL P ON (A.DOC_NO = P.DOC_NO) WHERE (A.DOC_WRITER = #{userNo} OR P.SECOND_APPROVER_NO = #{userNo} OR P.LAST_APPROVER_NO = #{userNo})
AND A.STATUS = #{status}

SELECT A.DOC_NO ,D.DEPT_NAME ,T.DOC_NAME ,A.DOC_WRITER ,A.DOC_TITLE ,TO_CHAR(A.CREATE_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD')"CREATE_DATE" ,A.STATUS ,A.EMERGENCY ,TO_CHAR(P.SECOND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "SECOND_DATE" ,TO_CHAR(P.LAST_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "LAST_DATE" ,P.SECOND_APPROVER_NO ,P.LAST_APPROVER_NO ,A.STATUS FROM APPROVAL_DOC A JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (A.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE ) JOIN DOC_TYPE T ON (A.DOC_TYPE = T.DOC_TYPE) JOIN APPROVAL P ON (A.DOC_NO = P.DOC_NO)
WHERE (D.DEPT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR T.DOC_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' OR A.DOC_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%') AND (A.DOC_WRITER = #{userNo} OR P.SECOND_APPROVER_NO = #{userNo} OR P.LAST_APPROVER_NO = #{userNo})
WHERE D.DEPT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' AND (A.DOC_WRITER = #{userNo} OR P.SECOND_APPROVER_NO = #{userNo} OR P.LAST_APPROVER_NO = #{userNo})
WHERE T.DOC_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' AND (A.DOC_WRITER = #{userNo} OR P.SECOND_APPROVER_NO = #{userNo} OR P.LAST_APPROVER_NO = #{userNo})
WHERE A.DOC_TITLE LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%' AND (A.DOC_WRITER = #{userNo} OR P.SECOND_APPROVER_NO = #{userNo} OR P.LAST_APPROVER_NO = #{userNo})
WHERE (A.DOC_WRITER = #{userNo} OR P.SECOND_APPROVER_NO = #{userNo} OR P.LAST_APPROVER_NO = #{userNo})
AND A.STATUS = #{status}
ORDER BY DECODE(A.EMERGENCY,'Y',2), A.CREATE_DATE DESC

SELECT USER_NAME,DEPT_NAME,JOB_NAME,USER_NO,EMAIL FROM MEMBER JOIN DEPARTMENT USING(DEPT_CODE) JOIN JOB USING(JOB_CODE) WHERE STATUS = 'Y'
AND DEPT_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND USER_NAME LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
AND DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode}
ORDER BY USER_NAME

SELECT APP_NO ,DOC_NO,DEPT_CODE ,SECOND_JOB_NAME ,SECOND_APPROVER_NO ,SECOND_APPROVER ,SECOND_SIGNATURE ,LAST_APPROVER_NO ,LAST_JOB_NAME ,LAST_APPROVER ,LAST_SIGNATURE ,TO_CHAR(SECOND_DATE, 'MM/DD hh24:mi') "SECOND_DATE" ,TO_CHAR(LAST_DATE, 'MM/DD hh24:mi') "LAST_DATE" ,RETURN_REASON FROM APPROVAL WHERE DOC_NO = #{docNo}
SELECT APP_FILE_NO ,DOC_NO ,DEPT_CODE ,ORIGIN_NAME ,CHANGE_NAME ,UPLOAD_DATE ,FILE_PATH FROM APPROVAL_ATTACHMENT WHERE DOC_NO = #{docNo}

SELECT A.DOC_NO ,A.DEPT_CODE ,A.DOC_TYPE ,A.DOC_WRITER ,M.USER_NAME ,A.PHONE ,A.DOC_TITLE ,A.DOC_CONTENT ,TO_CHAR(A.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')"CREATE_DATE" ,A.STATUS ,A.EMERGENCY FROM APPROVAL_DOC A JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.USER_NO = A.DOC_WRITER) WHERE DOC_NO = #{docNo}
SELECT DOC_NO ,DEPT_CODE ,SUPPLY_NAME ,SUPPLY_SIZE ,AMOUNT, PRICE ,TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')"CREATE_DATE" FROM ITEM WHERE DOC_NO = #{docNo}

SELECT L.DOC_NO ,L.DEPT_CODE ,L.WORK_RECEIVER ,W.LEAVE_TYPE ,L.START_DATE ,L.END_DATE ,L.LEAVE_CONTENT ,TO_CHAR(L.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "CREATE_DATE" ,L.LEAVE_STATUS FROM LEAVE L JOIN WORK_TYPE W ON (W.LEAVE_CODE = L.LEAVE_CODE) WHERE L.DOC_NO = #{docNo}

SELECT TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'MON') "CREATE_DATE" ,NVL(COUNT(CASE WHEN STATUS ='Y' THEN 1 END),0) "APPROVAL" ,NVL(COUNT(CASE WHEN STATUS ='R' THEN 1 END),0) "REJECT" FROM APPROVAL_DOC WHERE TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY') AND DOC_WRITER = #{docWriter} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'MON') ORDER BY CREATE_DATE
